articles.title: Parents set to bring home daughter get alarming call from adoption agency
articles.description: Parents in McDonough, Georgia, were set to travel to China to meet their adopted daughter. Now, the adoption process is put on hold due to the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.author: Opinion by Michael Bociurkiw
articles.title: Opinion: China's hero doctor was punished for telling the truth about coronavirus
articles.description: In their botched handling of the tragic death of Li Wenliang, the Chinese doctor who sounded the alarm on the Wuhan coronavirus, authorities in Beijing seem to want it both ways, writes Michael Bociurkiw.
articles.content:
Michael Bociurkiw is a global affairs analyst and a former spokesman for the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe. Follow him on Twitter @WorldAffairsPro. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his; view more opinions on CNN.

articles.author: Dr. Tom Frieden
articles.title: New study an eye-opener on how coronavirus is spreading and how little we know
articles.description: A study published Friday in the medical journal JAMA found that 41% of the first 138 patients diagnosed at one hospital in Wuhan, China, were presumed to be infected in that hospital.
articles.content: Dr. Tom Frieden is the former director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and former commissioner of the New York City Health Department. He is currently president and CEO of Resolve to Save Lives, a global non-profit initiative funded by B… [+5927 chars]

articles.title: Life under coronavirus quarantine in the US
articles.description: People hoping to enter the United States after being in China are now facing new travel and quarantine rules to contain the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.author: Faith Karimi and Lily Lee, CNN
articles.title: An American dies of coronavirus in China hours after the last chartered flights evacuated hundreds of US citizens, embassy says
articles.description: A United States citizen died from the coronavirus in the Chinese city of Wuhan, embassy officials said Saturday, marking what appears to be the first American death from the outbreak that has killed hundreds.

articles.author: Joshua Berlinger, CNN
articles.title: Deadliest day for coronavirus as mainland China records 86 fatalities, while US announces first American death
articles.description: Mainland China had its deadliest day in the coronavirus outbreak Friday, with authorities reporting 86 fatalities from the pneumonia-like illness that is paralyzing much of the country.
articles.content:
(CNN)Mainland China had its deadliest day in the coronavirus outbreak Friday, with authorities reporting 86 fatalities from the pneumonia-like illness that is paralyzing much of the country.

articles.author: Analysis by Charles Riley and Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: The coronavirus is already hurting the world economy. Here's why it could get really scary
articles.description: Nearly two decades have passed since a coronavirus known as SARS emerged in China, killing hundreds of people and sparking panic that sent a chill through the global economy. The virus now rampaging across China could be much more damaging.

articles.author: Geneva Sands, CNN
articles.title: Global Entry banned for NY until state grants access to DHS, says acting secretary
articles.description: Acting Homeland Security Secretary Chad Wolf said Friday that New Yorkers will regain access to Global Entry and other Trusted Traveler Programs only if the state grants access to its motor vehicle database.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nectar Gan, CNN
articles.title: In coronavirus-stricken Wuhan, an army of volunteers is offering a lifeline to those under lockdown
articles.description: Hours after a state-imposed lockdown brought public transport in the Chinese city of Wuhan to a halt in late January, Wan Jiuxiong and his colleagues sprang into action.
articles.content:
We Wuhan people have to save ourselves
Wan Jiuxiong, a volunteer driver

articles.description: Norwegian Cruise Lines and Royal Caribbean International implemented the new protocols this week.
